description: This file contains CSS styles for the frontend of a Tic Tac Toe application, including theme management and responsive design features.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application container styling, including background color and text alignment.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header style for the application, including layout and responsive design properties.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styles for the theme toggle button that allows switching between light and dark themes.

methods.name: App-logo-spin
methods.description: Keyframe animation for spinning the application logo.
